Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: JAI_Chander
Reviews.Content: location minutes walk sea front bosporus bridge view hotel international travelers keys day stay india bursa getting hotel hotel pick van 2 hrs due traffic jam ok biz tourist except bridge complimentary break fast pool looking bridge nice view pool neat

Reviews.Title: “good hotel after renovation”
Reviews.Author: salih02
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night business trip istanbul pleased fine breakfast clean wonderful bosphorus view learned undergone major renovation recently hotel nicer hotel located beautiful districts istanbul location plus hotel visit historical city center sultanahmet surroundings topkapä± palace basilica st sophia grand bazaar etc hotel little stay hotel views bosphorus

Reviews.Title: “Low cost: 20 TL from centre ( on a good day)”
Reviews.Author: JohnnyAsbestos
Reviews.Content: nice hotel wrong itis lot cheaper hotels vew 5 mins walk view fro hotel pedestrian staff spite key time bell hop door typical region enjoyable front house little noisy traffic muezzin otherwise value local plenty value restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Location is the main advantage”
Reviews.Author: guru52
Reviews.Content: hotel located near bosphorus bridge joining continents europe asia ok hotel renovation crowded road lot noise comes night sleep peaceful write hotel except location

Reviews.Title: “quite good value but certainly not 4 star”
Reviews.Author: MikeAnnette
Reviews.Content: hotel located staff friendly tired beds woeful expect 4 star hotel actual value compared chain hotels istanbul dont expect muchi close lift incessant noise bad

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare on the Bosphorus”
Reviews.Author: Life101
Reviews.Content: nicely laid advert called hotel sham deserve start called 4 5 stars claim arrived hotel directed shell compalined advised shown booking bookingcom hours telling totally sold front desk guy manages pull slightly bigger air con temp 70s complained agian told duty manager dont baby cot nor aircon called air con dont central ac air blower little kids crying lungs coz cant sleep coz temprature impossible sleep finally managed told duty manager leaving dump comes hour cooling tired sleep woke morning daughters bedding wet sweat complaining headache tired breakfast rush hospital cause thrown everthing sick due horrible stayed inwe hospital bill return hospital demanded manager ac cools informs video yesterday ac fan vents needless stormed pathetic property paid night horrible experince checked ourself ceylan intercon kids finally getting peaceful sleep proper aircon facilities summary liars nice booking admit outdated pics attached avoid plague trip hotel list properties trip heading inform people property hell

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel but not trying to be better”
Reviews.Author: Shuttie
Reviews.Content: stayed looking cheaper option popular names conrad swissotel shown 5 star boasts free wifi access hotel rock cafe bar spacious clean maintained quality compared names 5 star quality wifi poor lobby bar breakfast nice spread complaints staff tried conversation barmen rest polite effort ate lobby bar couple times food definetly recommend steaks local village bussling bars restaurants worth visit size road bridge am afraid despite slightly cheaper main rivals wont staying closer ferry office asian istanbul consider try little harder
